hero.title: Construction is the art of creating the future with materials.
hero.description: We are TD Capital Market company - specializing in construction of residential and non-residential buildings, reconstruction of infrastructure destroyed by war, construction of shelters and underground complexes. Our projects combine modern technologies, quality materials and a responsible approach.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: Construction of residential and non-residential buildings, reconstruction of infrastructure destroyed by war, construction of shelters and underground facilities. Use of modern technologies and materials to ensure safety and durability.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Production of fortification structures: metal structures and concrete barrier pyramids. All products comply with DSTU B V.2.6-2:2009 standards.

design.title: Design
design.description: Development of building and structure concepts taking into account safety requirements and state standards. Complete design cycle - from idea to implementation.

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: Comprehensive provision, participation in public procurement, execution of contracts with public and private customers. Fast delivery and logistics optimization to minimize costs and time.

about.title: About Us

main.paragraph1: TD Stolytsya Market is a team of professionals specializing in construction of residential and non-residential buildings, infrastructure reconstruction, shelters, and underground complexes. Since 2016, we have successfully implemented projects of any complexity, using modern technologies, quality materials, and innovative approaches. Our experience allows us to ensure high quality and reliability for each facility, from small structures to large-scale infrastructure solutions.
main.paragraph2: One of our key areas is the production of metal structures and concrete solutions that provide safety and durability. We work responsibly and adhere to international standards, which is confirmed by our certified management system: ISO 9001(2015), ISO 45001(2019), and 14001(2015).
main.paragraph3: Our team consists of over 100 qualified employees who work daily to implement the most challenging tasks. We have all necessary licenses to conduct our business, including EL01:8020-2630-9976-1706, which guarantees our clients transparency and compliance with all regulatory requirements.
main.paragraph4: The company's annual turnover is 1 billion hryvnias, which demonstrates our stability and client trust. We take pride in the fact that each of our projects combines modern technologies, quality materials, and a responsible approach. Our goal is to create spaces that provide comfort, safety, and durability for everyone.

about.mainQuote: We build not just structures — we create a reliable future

featuredProject.title: Our Flagship Project
featuredProject.description: A complex of protective structures and shelters, implemented in 2023 for the defense sector. The project included the construction of underground facilities using innovative materials that provide maximum level of protection and comfort simultaneously.

step1.title: Analysis and Planning
step1.description: Detailed study of client needs, concept development, and cost estimation.

step2.title: Design
step2.description: Creation of technical documentation, 3D modeling of objects, and coordination of all details.

step3.title: Production and Construction
step3.description: Manufacturing of metal structures, preparation of materials, and construction of the facility under engineer supervision.

step4.title: Quality Control and Delivery
step4.description: Strict control of each stage of work and facility delivery with complete documentation and warranty.

history.title: Company History
history.paragraph1: TD Stolytsya Market was founded in 2016 by a group of civil engineers who aimed to create high-quality and reliable facilities using modern technologies. Initially, we implemented small commercial and residential projects, but thanks to clear planning and a responsible approach, we quickly expanded our scope of activities.
history.paragraph2: By 2019, the company had already established itself as a reliable executor of complex construction works, received ISO 9001(2015), ISO 45001(2019), and 14001(2015) certificates, and launched its own production of metal structures and concrete solutions. Further development was accompanied by participation in government tenders, infrastructure reconstruction, and construction of defensive structures after the beginning of the full-scale war.
history.paragraph3: Today, TD Stolytsya Market is a team of over 100 specialists implementing projects of any complexity. Our experience, modern technologies, and adherence to international standards allow us to guarantee the quality and durability of each facility. We continue to develop while maintaining our key values — reliability, innovation, and responsibility to clients and society.

philosophy.title: Company Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: We believe that construction is not just about creating objects, but forming spaces that affect people's quality of life. Each of our projects combines innovation, reliability, and responsibility. We strive not only to meet client needs but to exceed expectations by creating solutions that withstand time and challenges.
philosophy.paragraph2: Our mission is to build a future where each facility becomes a testament to quality, safety, and durability. We understand that our work affects people's lives, so we approach each project with maximum dedication and attention to detail.
philosophy.paragraph3: For us, not only technical parameters are important, but also client trust, environmental responsibility, and social significance. We build not just buildings — we create conditions for development, protection, and comfort.
philosophy.paragraph4: Our philosophy is a combination of professional experience, modern technologies, and belief that each project matters. We build not just objects — we build trust.

team.title: Our Team
team.quote: Our success is based on the professionalism, dedication, and innovative thinking of each team member.
team.paragraph1: Our team consists of over 100 qualified employees who work daily to implement the most challenging tasks. These are professionals in various fields: engineers, architects, technologists, managers, safety and logistics specialists.
team.paragraph2: We continuously improve the qualifications of our specialists, implement new approaches to work, and provide comfortable conditions for the development of each team member. Our employees have access to modern technologies and the opportunity to realize their potential in significant projects.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.intro: Our strategy is aimed at achieving leadership in construction, manufacturing, and infrastructure reconstruction through innovation, quality, and a responsible approach. We strive to become a reliable partner for our clients by offering comprehensive solutions that ensure safety, durability, and efficiency.

goal1.title: Expanding Service Range
items: Implementation of new directions such as smart construction and environmentally oriented projects.
Development of production of innovative fortification materials.

goal2.title: Improving Quality and Efficiency
items: Implementation of modern technologies (BIM modeling, process automation).
Continuous training and professional development of employees.

goal3.title: Strengthening Market Position
items: Active participation in government and private tenders.
Expanding geography of activities and entering new markets.

goal4.title: Developing Partnership Relations
items: Creating strategic alliances with reliable suppliers and contractors.
Expanding the network of partners to optimize logistics and reduce costs.

goal5.title: Social and Environmental Responsibility
items: Implementation of environmentally friendly technologies in construction.
Supporting social initiatives aimed at infrastructure restoration and assistance to those affected by the war.

value1.title: Reliability
value1.description: We keep our promises and guarantee quality.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.description: We continuously improve processes and technologies.

value3.title: Responsibility
value3.description: We work considering the interests of clients, society, and the environment.

cta.title: Ready to Implement Your Project?
cta.text: Entrust us with the implementation of your construction ideas. Our team will ensure high-quality execution of work in compliance with all standards and deadlines.

items.question: How does "TD Stolytsia Market" differ from other construction companies?
items.answer: We combine 9+ years of experience with modern technologies (BIM-modeling, in-house production of materials) and adhere to international standards (ISO 9001, ISO 45001). Our key advantages are turnkey solutions, individual approach to each project, and participation in Ukraine's infrastructure restoration.

items.question: Do you have quality certificates?
items.answer: Yes, our work complies with international standards:
items.additionalInfo: All products are manufactured according to Ukrainian state standards.

items.question: What projects have you implemented since 2022?
listItems: Construction of protective structures and bunkers;
Supply of fortification structures (concrete blocks, metal barriers).

items.question: Do you participate in tenders?
items.answer: Yes, we successfully implement government and commercial contracts. Our advantages are transparent conditions, adherence to deadlines, and support at all stages.

items.question: Do you provide guarantees for your projects?
items.answer: Yes, all work is accompanied by warranty obligations. The term depends on the type of project and is discussed individually.

items.question: How is employee safety organized during artillery attacks?
items.answer: All construction sites are equipped with:
listItems: Medical and psychological support in teams.

items.question: Do you use foreign technologies?
listItems: Finnish methods for rapid construction in winter conditions;

items.question: What are the advantages of cooperation for construction material suppliers?
listItems: Monthly procurement volume exceeding 1 million euros
Readiness to develop brand dealership networks in Ukraine
Integration of materials into project solutions

items.question: Are you ready to act as an official distributor of construction materials in Ukraine?
items.answer: Yes, we are open to strategic partnerships with manufacturers and ready to develop a dealer network for your products, ensuring their promotion, logistics, and presence in key projects throughout Ukraine.

items.question: Do you provide design services?
items.answer: Yes, our specialists perform a full cycle of design — from concept to implementation, taking into account safety, energy efficiency, and the possibility of deep integration of new materials or solutions into the structure of the object.

items.question: In which regions of Ukraine do you operate?
items.answer: We work throughout Ukraine. Our logistics are optimized to ensure fast delivery of materials and efficient project implementation regardless of geography.

items.question: What volume of work can the company perform monthly?
items.answer: Our company is capable of processing projects with a procurement volume of over 1 million euros per month, thanks to our own production facilities, logistics, and experienced team.

items.question: How many employees work in your company?
items.answer: Our team consists of over 100 qualified specialists, including engineers, architects, designers, logistics experts, technical workers, and administrative staff.

items.question: Do you participate in public procurement?
items.answer: Yes. We actively work with the Prozorro system, participate in open tenders, and have successful cases of implementing government contracts in construction and reconstruction.

items.question: What goods and materials do you purchase most often?
Do you work on a "turnkey construction" basis?
items.answer: Yes. We provide a full cycle of services: from design and approvals — to implementation, quality control, project handover, and its further support.

items.question: How to become your supplier or partner?
items.answer: Simply send us a brief presentation or commercial proposal. We review all requests and are open to long-term relationships with suppliers, distributors, and manufacturers focused on quality and reliability.

items.question: Do you provide reconstruction services for war-damaged objects?
items.answer: Yes. One of our priorities is infrastructure restoration. We have experience in reconstructing residential buildings, administrative and social facilities, including reinforcement of foundations and load-bearing structures.

latestProjects.title: Our Latest Projects
latestProjects.subtitle: Explore our most recent construction and reconstruction work
